text: Men ɓoori e ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗen konnaagu, canɗi ɗin no ila senngo ley maɓɓe, ɓe wi'a : "Yettoore woodani Alla On fewuɗo men e ɗum ɗoo, men wonaano feewooɓe si Alla fewnaano men.
